argument.name: TargetContainer
argument.description: The container to copy objects to.

page.description: Copies all items to another container. Any existing items in the destination container will be replaced.
page.example:
dim Container as A5Storage::DataContainer = null_value() dim TargetContainer as A5Storage::DataContainer = null_value()
CallResult = A5Storage::DataContainer::Open(Container, "Provider='Disk';Container='c:\A5Webroot\logs';")
? CallResult.Success = .T.
CallResult = A5Storage::DataContainer::Open(TargetContainer, "Provider='Disk';Container='c:\A5Webroot\logs2';")
? CallResult.Success = .T.
? Container.CopyContentsTo(TargetContainer) = .T.
